feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
